bibl.title: The Administration of Egyptian Thebes in the Early Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Pennsylvania. Summary in DA 57 (1996-1997) pp. 1788-1789-A. - Examines the organization and evolution of the administration, as reflected in the papyri and ostraca of a community of mortuary priests.
MUHS Brian Paul, The Administration of Egyptian Thebes in the Early Ptolemaic Period.
